page.title: 15TOURISM
page.content: Cirencester is popular because of its location in the Cotswolds, its old buildings and Roman remains.Visitors come from as far as Darlington,Bodmin, Norfolk and the Isle of Wight. Most stay from 1 to 12 days. Some people stay in caravans and some in bed and breakfast. They nearly all come by car or coach.Lots of visitors we spoke to came from abroad,from South Africa, Australia,the U.S.A.,Holland,Canada and Saudi Arabia. Most of these visitors were only staying for a short time.One lady was staying 6 months with friends.E verybody liked the town especially the church with its Anne Boleyn Cup,the old buildings,the market and the bakers shops.Everyone would like to come again,but some visitors were disappointed by the weather.
